description: Defines the Score entity class for a Click Quest game, mapping to the 'scores' table in a database. Contains fields for id, playerName, points, and createdAt, with appropriate JPA annotations and lifecycle management.

classes.name: Score
classes.description: Entity class representing a player's score entry with JPA annotations, including fields for id, playerName, points, createdAt, and lifecycle callback for setting creation time.

methods.name: Score(String playerName, Integer points)
methods.description: Constructor to initialize a score with player name and points.

methods.name: onCreate()
methods.description: Lifecycle callback annotated with @PrePersist to set createdAt timestamp before persisting.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier (primary key) of the score entry.

methods.name: getPlayerName()
methods.description: Retrieves the name or identifier of the player associated with this score.

methods.name: setPlayerName(String playerName)
methods.description: Sets or updates the player's name for this score entry.

methods.name: getPoints()
methods.description: Retrieves the total points achieved in this score entry.

methods.name: setPoints(Integer points)
methods.description: Sets or updates the points achieved.

methods.name: getCreatedAt()
methods.description: Retrieves the timestamp of when this score was recorded.
